name: Mundus - Impossible Universe
description: We invite you to join the great shaman in a quest to explore the impossible universe in this fantastic match-3 game. You will find dozens of unique worlds with their own rewardsâ€¦ and dangers. Face challenging match-3 puzzles and meet strange denizens of fantastic planets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.0GHz CPU Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.2GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
